message.content: {"given_definition_quality":55,"better_definition":"time (of an event); occurrence; next","sentence":"请问，下一次是什么时候？","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image showing a young person standing at a bus stop, looking at a calendar on their phone. The background is subtly dilapidated, with cracks in the concrete and overgrown plants. The mood is gentle and hopeful, with a faint glow on the horizon, softly colored. The calendar app highlights the word 'next' in Chinese (“下一次”).","sentence_translation":"May I ask, when is the next time?"}
